news.title: Arkham Exchange pivoting to fully decentralized platform, CEO says
news.titleOriginal: Arkham Exchange pivoting to fully decentralized platform, CEO says
news.summary: Arkham CEO denies shutdown reports as the exchange pivots from a CEX to a fully decentralized model amid record DEX derivatives growth.

news.title: Why Bitcoin has recently reacted more to liquidity conditions than to rate cuts
news.titleOriginal: Why Bitcoin has recently reacted more to liquidity conditions than to rate cuts
news.summary: Bitcoin’s recent moves track liquidity stress more than Fed rate cuts. Here’s how balance sheet policy and cash flows shape crypto markets.

news.title: Google Cloud flags North Korea-linked crypto malware campaign
news.titleOriginal: Google Cloud flags North Korea-linked crypto malware campaign
news.summary: Mandiant, which operates under Google Cloud, has tracked the suspected North Korean scammers since 2018, and AI has helped scale up malicious attacks

news.title: Hong Kong greenlights crypto margin financing and perpetual trading
news.titleOriginal: Hong Kong greenlights crypto margin financing and perpetual trading
news.summary: Hong Kong’s SFC will allow licensed brokers to offer digital asset margin financing and set a framework for crypto perpetuals for professionals.

news.title: European Parliament throws support behind digital euro
